lines.text: Excuse me... a little stiff. Caught a bitch of a virus.
[last lines]
Terry?
Yeah?
Do me a favor.
Anything.
Turn off that damn machine.
[Terry switch off the ECG monitor Bram is hooked up to]

[Karl is sniffing Terry's address book]
Karl what are you doing?

[stops]
Um... the woman that bought the Paper Warrior today, she forgot her address book and I was thinking about going down there and...
[smiles]
returning it.
How did I get lucky enough to find you? That is a terrific gesture.
It'd be a real pleasure.
Guess again, Einstein. I'm dead already!
You don't think a hacker did this do you?
Well, when you leave it out in the open no self-respecting hacker is going to pass it by.

[grits teeth and pulls hair out]
Auugghhh! God Damnit!
[tears out of room]
Get the hell out of my way!
You know you don't handle stress very well, Phil.
Jesus Christ.

[hands Elliot bad ladder]
Here's your ladder sir.
What the hell is this?
[hits a metal thing on it which sways wildly]
What are trying to do? Kill me? Go get another ladder and make sure you fill out the right form this time. 12-M. That's M as in moron.
[looks at Elliot displeased]
Well go!

[to rookie cop]
Looks like your gonna have a hell of a night as your first day on the force.
You can't run, you can't hide, you can't win.
The phone company called. Someone just dialed 700 dollars worth of 900 numbers in the last 24 hours.
Think about it. 700 bucks in 24 hours. I'd have Laryngitis.
How do you explain it then?
I don't know, maybe it was Axl. He humps anything that moves.
Don't get smart with me!
Ooh! This is nice, if you want to attract a golfer.
I'm getting style tips from somebody with 87 black T-shirts!
